title: Smudges
subTitle: Unintended blotch or smudge of ink that disrupts the intended design or text, typically caused by high ink coverage or equipment malfunctions.

question.text:
Product is laminated?
Lamination is an additional layer applied over the printed product to prevent ink from smudging and ensure durability.

solution.title: Smudges
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
Process the same file

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: No high ink coverage and no coating implies the inks should be absorbed quickly and the risk of stains is small. As there are still stains this case is valid on the supplier, but we can reprint with the same file on the same product. If a reprint is chosen, advise the customer to add a lamination if available as this will prevent the issue from repeating itself. If the same product is requested, contact traffic prior to production so they can align with supplier.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
Although the submitted file does not contain areas with high ink coverage and it was printed on uncoated paper that absorbs ink quickly, there are still stains caused by inattention or insufficient drying time. 
We would like to offer to reprint the product using the same file. If there's no time for a reprint, could you use this product at a discount?

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier - Quality Wrong Complaint Type: Stains & Smudging

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

options.action: Open the file in acrobat & check the 'Total area coverage' in the output preview screen.

question.text:
High ink processed?
IF DOUBT: Run the HelloCheck on Acrobat Check the 'Total Area Coverage' and set to 320% Check with DTP

solution.title: Smudges
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the same file

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Uncoated paper has a high absorbency so inks should dry quick, while laminated products have an extra layer of film over the print, both options should prevent smudges. If these are still smudged it indicates the supplier did not use the correct product, finishing or allowed plenty time to dry. We can reprint with the same file on the same order. If it is clear that not enough time was allowed for the product to dry, contact traffic prior to reprinting so they can align with the supplier.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The smudges were caused by insufficient drying time, leading to wet ink when the product was handled. To resolve this, we are happy to offer a reprint of the same product using the same file. 
If a reprint isnâ€™t feasible due to time constraints, would you be willing to use this product at a discount?

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier - Quality Wrong Complaint Type: Stains & Smudging

options.action: Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Smudges
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
Create a fixed cPDF for reprint.

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: High ink areas caused the ink to spread as it needs more time to dry. We can ask the customer to adjust their file and remove the high coverage areas for a reprint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
It appears that some areas have high ink coverage, and we did not provide a warning. 
We would like to offer you a reprint on the same product with a revised file that reduces ink coverage in the affected areas, or a reprint on a laminated or uncoated product using the same file, please note that the latter option is still quite risky. 
If a reprint is not feasible due to time constraints, would you consider using this product at a discounted price?

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint type: No Warning Sent

options.action: Check with customer whether they're able to remove the stains. If not removable it means the smudge is under the laminate

question.text: Is the ink smudge under the laminate?

options.action:
Check with customer whether they're able to remove the stains.
If removable it means the smudge is on the laminate

solution.title: Smudges
solution.action:
File complaint in Presta 
Reprocess the same file

questions.title: Is the ink smudge under the laminate?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: It is unclear at what stage the stains appeared but they were caused during the printing process so we still deem them valid on supplier. We can offer a reprint with the same file on the same product. If it is clear that not enough time was allowed for the product to dry, contact traffic prior to reprinting so they can align with the supplier.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The smudges were caused by insufficient drying time, leading to wet ink when the product was handled. To resolve this, we are happy to offer a reprint of the same product using the same file. 
If a reprint isnâ€™t feasible due to time constraints, would you be willing to use this product at a discount?

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier - Quality Wrong Complaint Type: Stains & Smudging

solution.title: Smudges
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta. 
Reprocess the same file 
Create a ticket to traffic so they can raise this case with the supplier, ensuring it does not happen again

questions.title: Is the ink smudge under the laminate?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The smudges appeared after the printing process, indicating the product was packaged in or by dirty equipment that transferred stains. Complaint caused by careless handling of the product by the supplier.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The smudges were caused by careless handling during the finishing/packaging process. The product was contaminated by ink-stained equipment. 
To rectify this situation we are happy to offer a reprint. 
If a reprint isnâ€™t feasible due to time constraints, would you be willing to use this product at a discount?

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier - Quality Wrong Complaint Type: Stains & Smudging
